name: The March of the White King
name_original: The March of the White King
description:
It's some sort of automatic chess?

Recruit units by dragging them to your hand and battle your way through waves of enemies. You can mouseover icons to learn more about the unit's attributes.

Battling takes place automatically starting from the leftmost units, so just worry about your units' positioning and don't leave your king unprotected!

Asset credits Unit Images

Aekashics Librarium Static Battlers by Ækashics.

https://aekashics.itch.io/aekashics-librarium-librarium-static-batch-megapack
